casebody.data:
HACKER
v.
HOMEWARD RESIDENTIAL S249902 Supreme Court of California. JULY 18, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

Review granted on the court's own motion; transferred to CA 2/1. At the request of the Court of Appeal, review is ordered on this court's own motion. The cause is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Second Appellate District, Division One, for further proceedings.
